reminders.hadith: The believer is not one who eats his fill while his neighbor goes hungry.

reminders.reminder: Be kind to your parents today
reminders.hadith: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment.

reminders.reminder: Pray your prayers on time today
reminders.hadith: The deed most beloved to Allah is the prayer offered on time.

reminders.reminder: Smile in the face of others today
reminders.hadith: Your smile for your brother is a charity.
Indeed, He likes not those who commit excess.
Allah is pleased with His servant who, when he eats something, praises Him for it.
And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it.
Dua is the essence of worship.
Tell the believing men to lower their gaze and guard their modesty.

reminders.reminder: Visit the sick if possible today
reminders.hadith: Feed the hungry, visit the sick, and free the captives.
